description.short: The RAM 1500 series of trucks can get you through any adventure with ease.
description.long:
The RAM 1500 series of trucks can get you through any adventure with ease.

The Rebel and TRX packages offer more off road capability than a standard 1500, and THOR can help you take it to the next level with suspension systems from Carli Suspension, AEV Conversions, and BDS.
